name: Badass Locomotive
description:
The world's premier hat-based train-simulator!

Lead your train to victory in this serene and atmospheric puzzler. Build your track and watch it go!

Features 20 brain- bending unique levels - Can you master them all?

Build your own train and chose from 12 colors and 5 hats to create up to 72 trains!

Features:
- 5 Hats!
- 12 Colors!
- 72 Trains possible!
- 20 Levels!
- Entirely mouse-controlled!
